SELECT SEQ, ID, PWD, NAME, EMAIL, PHONE, POST, ADDRESS, QUESTION, ANSWER, AUTH, DEL, MYIMG, BLACKLIST, REGDATE FROM ( SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS ROWNUM, SEQ, ID, PWD, NAME, EMAIL, PHONE, POST, ADDRESS, QUESTION, ANSWER, AUTH, DEL, MYIMG, BLACKLIST, REGDATE FROM `MEDI`.medi_member, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) R WHERE 1=1 AND DEL=0
